name: Thunderbird: The Legend Begins
description: Journey deep into the heart of an ancient realm of myth and legend in this epic interactive virtual reality adventure series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 / R9 270X DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Developed for GTX970 and above
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Quad core CPU 3.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 / R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Developed for GTX970 and above
